issue.title: Invalid filter removal request
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer; - [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed; - [X] This is not an ad/bug report. ### Problem description It was infected with adshield and only breakage when I turned on adguard for safari, but I made exceptions to a few filters and it worked normally. So it seems there is a problem with the four domains below.
||html-load.com^$popup

comment.body:
`$popup` modifier does not block any request in a webpage.
It closes a browser tab that the visited URL is matched.

To resolve your issue, please install [microShield](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield).

comment.body:
It seems that content is not loaded without account (after scrolling down there are only blurred images).

You can add these rules to user rules:
```adblock
ebooktops.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-addEventListener', 'scroll')
ebooktops.com##div[class^="layout___StyledDiv"] > div[class^="overlay___StyledDiv"]
```
but website will be broken.
